landing_hero_title: Give Your Sales Team the Tools to Win Every Sale
landing_hero_subtitle: Specially designed for the front line. Empower your door-to-door and telemarketing salespeople with strategies that work. Managers and owners get a clear insight into performance to drive growth.
landing_hero_trial: Fully functional, no credit card required.
landing_features_title: The Complete Toolkit for Profitable Sales
landing_features_subtitle: Everything your team needs to excel, from preparation to closing and coaching. Supported by smart technology.
feature_pitch_generator_desc: Create winning, custom pitches. Our tool analyzes your target audience and provides a complete strategy, including objections and tone advice.
feature_crm_desc: Manage your clients effortlessly. The tool summarizes your notes, suggests action points, and prepares you for every conversation with an automatic briefing.
feature_compa_desc: Compare your offer live with the market. Get instant insight into your strengths and weaknesses against your rivals.
feature_gamification_desc: Motivate your team with personal goals, sales streaks, and badges. Turn selling into a winning game.
feature_management_desc: As a manager or owner, get a helicopter view of your teams' and branches' performance. Adjust where necessary.
feature_ai_desc: Practice your pitches in realistic scenarios against a virtual client. Receive instant feedback and improve your technique.
landing_cta_subtitle: Give your team the tools they deserve and see the difference in the numbers. Start working smarter today.
rates_subtitle: Simple, transparent, and powerful. One rate for all features.
rates_trial_body: Test all features of Sales Copilot, no strings attached.
about_subtitle: Born from practical experience, built for results.
about_p1: SalExplosive is not just a tool; it's the result of 5 years of hands-on experience on the front lines of the sales world. Our founder started as a sales agent and climbed the ranks as a leader, team leader, and finally project manager.
about_p2: During this journey, one challenge became painfully clear: as a leader, you want to support, coach, and guide your team in the field to success. But reality is harsh. You can't be everywhere at once, especially when you also have to meet your own sales targets. Valuable coaching moments are lost, and the potential of talented salespeople remains untapped.
about_p3: This frustrating dilemma was the spark that created SalExplosive. We asked ourselves: 'What if there was a way to provide that crucial support, exactly when a salesperson needs it, without the leader having to be physically present?' From that question, we developed a powerful toolkit that acts as the ever-present co-pilot for every sales agent.
about_p4: Our mission is simple: we bridge the gap between a leader's limited time and a salesperson's unlimited potential. We give leaders the tools to empower their team remotely and salespeople the confidence and strategy to win every sale.
about_p5: SalExplosive is more than software; it's a partner in growth. Built by a salesperson, for salespeople. We are here to strengthen the front line, maximize results, and turn every team member into a top performer.
contact_subtitle: Have questions, comments, or want a demo? We'd love to hear from you.
contact_form_submitted_body: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
persona_sceptical_manager_desc: An experienced manager with little time, who gets straight to the point and is focused on ROI and concrete results.
persona_friendly_consumer_desc: An interested but price-conscious consumer who is open to a conversation but needs to be convinced of the value.
persona_technical_expert_desc: A detail-oriented professional who asks in-depth, technical questions and wants to understand the specifications.
feedback_error: Could not generate feedback. Please try again.
feedback_prompt_desc_opening: Was the opening strong and relevant? Was a good connection made?
feedback_prompt_desc_questioning: Did the salesperson ask the right questions to uncover the customer's needs?
feedback_prompt_desc_objections: How effectively were the customer's objections and critical questions handled?
feedback_prompt_desc_tone: Was the salesperson's tone appropriate for the situation and persona? Was the communication clear?
feedback_prompt_desc_closing: Was there a clear and confident attempt to close the conversation with a concrete next step?
choose_feedback_type: Choose the type of feedback you want to receive:
fast_scan_desc: Get quick, concise feedback. Ideal for a quick check.
deep_analysis_desc: Receive a detailed analysis. This may take a bit longer.
